channel.title: RuneRider | WebClient | Lots of stuff | 24/7 | No lagg & stable|Choose your play
channel.description:
[url=http://www.runerider.com][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4803161/logo_full.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.runerider.com][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4803157/home1.png[/img][/url][size=3.95em][url=http://www.runerider.com]RuneRider.com[/url][/size]
[b]Latest Big Updates[/b] - Added ::funpk - Removed modes - Added Player killing system + much more(check forum)
[b]Server features:[/b] -Squeal of Fortune -Modes to choose between. -Construction! -Dominion Tower! -Queen Black Dragon -Safe and Unsafe Pk portals -Good Combat! -Hunter -Custom Dungeoneering -Ancient Curses -Quick prays -HighScores for classic mode -FullScreen -Full Summoning! -742 cache -Sound & Music -GodWars with Nex -toggle new models on & off ::switchitemslook -Full Godwars(all bosses) -Working LootShare -Many Monsters to train on -Working Vengance -Full autocasting on magic -Constant Updates -Staff Of Light -All skills is trainable!! -All Skills Work!!! -Full Pvp weapons -All Specials Work -Working wilderness obelisk teleporters -Many Shops -Full functioning Clan Chat -Clue Scroll - New! - New Custom items - Drygore weapons! -Perfect Hybriding -Full dueling -Full Fight pits
Download Client: [url=http://runerider.com/play/download.php]RuneRider - Desktop Client[/url]
[b]xp rates:[/b] - Melee 630xp Per Hit - Range 630xp Per Hit - Mage 630xp Per Hit
[b]Commands[/b] :: home :: empty :: players :: switchitemslook :: changepassword
[b]Minigames[/b] -Full Soul Wars - New! - Fight Caves - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Pits - Dominion Tower [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/4087037/Difficulty.JPG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674986/1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674988/2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674991/3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3674998/4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3675001/5.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3675005/6.png[/img]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O1_ZXokubvM[/youtube]
[size=2em][url=http://www.runerider.com]www.runerider.com[/url][/size]
[b]More Pictures Coming Soon[/b]

item.description:
@RuneRider wrote:


[size=3.95em]RuneRider.com[/size]

Latest Big Updates

  • Added ::funpk
  • Removed modes
  • Added Player killing system
  • much more(check forum)

Server features:
-Squeal of Fortune
-Modes to choose between.
-Construction!
-Dominion Tower!
-Queen Black Dragon
-Safe and Unsafe Pk portals
-Good Combat!
-Hunter
-Custom Dungeoneering
-Ancient Curses
-Quick prays
-HighScores for classic mode
-FullScreen
-Full Summoning!
-742 cache
-Sound & Music
-GodWars with Nex
-toggle new models on & off ::switchitemslook
-Full Godwars(all bosses)
-Working LootShare
-Many Monsters to train on
-Working Vengance
-Full autocasting on magic
-Constant Updates
-Staff Of Light
-All skills is trainable!!
-All Skills Work!!!
-Full Pvp weapons
-All Specials Work
-Working wilderness obelisk teleporters
-Many Shops
-Full functioning Clan Chat
-Clue Scroll - New!

  • New Custom items
  • Drygore weapons!
    -Perfect Hybriding
    -Full dueling
    -Full Fight pits

Download Client: RuneRider - Desktop Client

xp rates:

  • Range 630xp Per Hit
  • Mage 630xp Per Hit

Commands
:: home
:: empty
:: players
:: switchitemslook
:: changepassword

Minigames
